definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be fair, beautiful (NH id. Pi. and deriv.; Aram. Aph. 0awpiy is suffice, finish, fail; cf. Aram. pe00 (PS:3015) beautiful, fit, Nö:§ 172 c. Anm. G H [offmann] LCB:1882, 321. Ar. wafay fulfil, perform; Eth. 0awafaya: II.
give (entirely) over to, into power of, Di:349)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[יׇפִיתְ]] Ct So 7:7; [[יׇפוּ]] So 4:10 So 7:2 Impf. 2 fs. [[וַתִּ֫יפִי]] (Kö:Lgh. i. 581) Ez Eze 16:13; 3 ms. apoc. [[וַיִּיף]] Eze 31:7; —be beautiful, subj. pers. Ct So 4:10, So 7:7; of feet v:So 7:2; of Jerus. under fig. of woman Ez Eze 16:13; Egypt under fig. of tree Eze 31:7.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְיַפֵָּהוּ]] Je 10:4 beautify an idol. The (

definitions.title: Pe‘al‘al
definitions.body: ?) Pf. form [[אָדָם יׇפְיׇפִיתָ מִבְּנֵי]] Ps 45:3 is contrary to all anal.: rd. either [[יׇפִיתָ]] or [[יְפֵיפִיתָ]] Ges: § 55. 3 Sta:§ 156 R Now (Kö:i. 583 f. defence is artificial): thou art more beautiful than, etc.
